Title: Prohibits the investment of certain public funds with companies conducting cryptocurrency business activities
Summary: Prohibits the investment of certain public funds with companies conducting a cryptocurrency business activity; directs the comptroller to take appropriate action to sell, redeem, divest or withdraw any investment held in such company.
LawCode: Add ยง423-d, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to prohibiting the investment of certain public funds with companies conducting cryptocurrency business activities
